channel.title: Comments on: Online timesheet, Web timesheet software, employee timesheet – 1time

item.title: By: jamil
item.dc:creator: jamil
item.content:encoded:
Our company is small but growing fast, and outgrew our Excel timesheets. We are now using Pacific Timesheet On-Demand (http://www.pacifictimesheet.com/) for the last few months and it has really streamlined time tracking, time report and billing. We added payroll integration last month to integrate with our Lawson system, and have seen near 100% adoption across the company.

I hope this helps!
Jamil

Pacific Timesheet – Web Time Tracking Software

item.title: By: derek organ
item.dc:creator: derek organ
item.description:
That isn't the intention, we haven't completed the website yet and that is the only reason for it. We'll have a tour of the application in the next two weeks.
We just wanted to get the application out into the public to get some feedback.

item.title: By: Paschal
item.dc:creator: Paschal
item.description: What's annoy me with this site is to be forced to register to have just a peek on the stuff. Just another way to build a marketing database :-(
